actionCalls.name: myRule_22_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Notification when lead is converted.

actionCalls.name: myRule_27_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Notification when Lead is Lost

actionCalls.name: myRule_34_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Notification when Lead Owner is Changed

value.stringValue:
Dear {!myVariable_current.Owner:User.LastName},
Lead is not converted from past 30 Days

Dear {!myVariable_current.Owner:User.Manager.LastName},
Lead is not converted from past 30 Days

Dear User,
Lead is Open from past 30 Days

rules.name: myRule_12
rules.label: If POC Present and Turn Over is present

rules.name: myRule_18
rules.label: IF POC is present TO is not present and GSTIN is present

rules.name: myRule_3
rules.label: Last Date Change Update for Reporting

rules.name: myRule_39
rules.label: Notification to Owner and Owner Manager(Team Head) for No Activity

rules.name: myRule_6
rules.label: If Email, Phone and GST is null

value.stringValue: AND ( NOT(ISPICKVAL([Lead].Turnover__c ,'0-50 Cr') ) , NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT([Lead].Turnover__c))), OR([Lead].Owner:User.Profile.Name == 'Field Sales' ,[Lead].Owner:User.Profile.Name == 'Inside Sales' ))

recordUpdates.name: myRule_12_A1
recordUpdates.label: IF 0-50CR then change record type for Integration

recordUpdates.name: myRule_12_A2
recordUpdates.label: IF TO 51-100 Cr or 101-250 Cr then assign to IS

recordUpdates.name: myRule_12_A3
recordUpdates.label: IF TO is except 0-50 Cr Or 51-100 Cr or 101-250 Cr then assign to FS

recordUpdates.name: myRule_20_A1
recordUpdates.label: Update the Record Type of the Record

recordUpdates.name: myRule_6_A1
recordUpdates.label: If Profiling is Active then assign to Queue
